name: Trashy Axolotl
description:
A game where you play as an Axolotl trying to swim his way back home and helping other fish on the way. Navigate the polluted waters and manage your stamina as you try and make your way home.

Global Game Jam 2019 Link

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/trashy-axolotl

Team:

  • Programming: Steven Cooney
  • Art: Diego Almazan, Jacob Taylor Neal
  • Music: Michael Kim
